goal.en: Introduction of the mechanism and treatment of cancer and the prevalent cancers in Taiwan
goal.ch: 介紹癌症發生的機制與治療及國人好發的癌症

content.en:
1 2/22 Introduction 褚志斌
2 2/29 Introduction: the nature of cancer 褚志斌
3 3/7 Oncogenes and tumor suppressor genes 褚志斌
4 3/14 Receptor tyrosine kinase and signal transduction 李家惠
5 3/21 Cancer Immunotherapy 徐欣伶
6 3/28 清明
7 4/4 RNA-regulated expression in cancer 夏興國
8 4/11 Genomic instability and cell cycle control in cancer 徐欣伶
9 4/18 Cancer cell plasticity and EMT for immune evasion 林文傑
10 4/25 Midterm Exam (期中考) 褚志斌
11 5/2 Invasion and metastasis 陳雅雯
12 5/9 Rational treatment of cancer 郭靜娟
13 5/16 Metabolism in the tumor microenvironment 郭呈欽
14 5/23 Tumor immunology and immunotherapy 莊宗顯
15 5/30 Heterotypic interaction and angiogenesis 李岳倫
16 6/6 Tumor microenvironment and macroenvironment 黃智興
17 6/13 Resistance of cancer therapy in the tumor microenvironment 張文祥
18 6/20 Final Exam (期末考) 褚志斌
